quiz.title: Which Disney Princess Are You?
quiz.description: Answer these questions to discover which Disney princess matches your personality!

princesses.name: Ariel
princesses.title: The Little Mermaid
princesses.description:
You're adventurous, curious, and always dreaming of exploring new worlds.
You follow your heart fearlessly and aren't afraid to take risks for what you believe in.
Your curiosity and free spirit inspire everyone around you.

princesses.name: Belle
princesses.title: Beauty and the Beast
princesses.description:
You're intelligent, independent, and see beauty beyond appearances.
You love learning and value inner character over superficial qualities.
Your kindness and open mind help you understand others deeply.

princesses.name: Mulan
princesses.title: Mulan
princesses.description:
You're courageous, loyal, and willing to make sacrifices for those you love.
You challenge expectations and prove that determination matters more than following tradition.
Your strength comes from your heart and your commitment to doing what's right.

princesses.name: Rapunzel
princesses.title: Tangled
princesses.description:
You're creative, optimistic, and find joy in every new experience.
Your enthusiasm is contagious and you approach life with wonder and excitement.
You're resilient and see opportunities where others see obstacles.

princesses.name: Tiana
princesses.title: The Princess and the Frog
princesses.description:
You're hardworking, ambitious, and dedicated to achieving your dreams through perseverance.
You value family, tradition, and the satisfaction of earning what you have.
Your determination and work ethic inspire everyone around you.

princesses.name: Moana
princesses.title: Moana
princesses.description:
You're a natural leader with a deep connection to your roots and community.
You're brave enough to forge your own path while honoring where you come from.
Your determination to help others drives you to overcome any challenge.

questions.question: How do you spend your ideal weekend?

answers.text: Exploring somewhere I've never been before
Curled up with a great book
Training or working on physical activities
Creating art or trying a new craft
Working on a personal project or goal
Spending time with family and friends

questions.question: What quality do you value most in others?

answers.text: Sense of adventure and spontaneity
Intelligence and depth of character
Loyalty and honor
Creativity and optimism
Work ethic and ambition
Compassion and sense of responsibility

questions.question: When faced with a challenge, you typically:

answers.text: Dive in headfirst without overthinking
Research and think it through carefully
Create a strategic plan and execute it
Stay positive and find creative solutions
Roll up your sleeves and work until it's done
Consider how it affects others and lead the way
To explore and experience everything life has to offer
To learn, grow, and find true connection
To make my family proud and protect those I love
To see the world and create beautiful things
To build something lasting through hard work
To help my community and make a real difference
Free-spirited and passionate
Thoughtful and kind
Strong and reliable
Cheerful and imaginative
Focused and determined
Inspiring and courageous

questions.question: What type of environment makes you happiest?

answers.text: Somewhere vast and full of mysteries to discover
A quiet, cozy space with room to think
An active environment where I can test my limits
A bright, inspiring space that sparks creativity
A busy place where I can work toward my goals
Surrounded by nature and community

questions.question: How do you handle rules and expectations?

answers.text: I follow my heart, even if it means breaking rules
I question them and think for myself
I respect them but will challenge them when necessary
I'm optimistic about finding my own path
I work within them to achieve my dreams
I honor tradition while forging new ways forward
The thrill of new experiences
Knowledge and understanding
Protecting and honoring my loved ones
Joy and self-expression
Achieving my goals through dedication
Serving a greater purpose
Fun and spontaneous adventures together
Deep conversations and mutual understanding
Unwavering loyalty and support
Sharing joy and creative projects
Supporting each other's dreams and growth
Building strong bonds and helping each other
My courage to follow my dreams
My ability to see the good in everyone
My determination and bravery
My positive outlook and creativity
My work ethic and perseverance
My leadership and sense of purpose

questions.question: How do you deal with setbacks?

answers.text: I stay optimistic and find another way
I reflect and learn from the experience
I get back up and fight harder
I find the silver lining and keep going
I work twice as hard to overcome them
I remember my purpose and push forward

questions.question: What would your perfect day include?

answers.text: An exciting adventure in uncharted territory
Discovering something new through reading or conversation
Accomplishing something that helps my family
Creating something beautiful and sharing it
Making significant progress on my goals
Leading others and making a positive impact
